text: Jyanna he loka du'a prarthana karatata, te svatah apalya palanakartyaci nikatata sodhata asatata ki tyancyapaiki kona adhika nikata ho'ila, te tara svatah tyacya daya-krpeci asa balagatata ani tyacya siksa-yatanepasuna bhayabhita rahatata. Nihsansaya tumacya palanakartyaca azaba (siksa-yatana) bhaya rakhanyaci gosta ahe
